text: Trafficking of children is a form of human trafficking: Violence and threats are used to recruit them, or they are kidnapped. They are then trafficked. ==Purposes== Trafficking children has several purposes: * Forcing them to work (this includes slavery, and debt bondage) * Sexually exploiting them (this includes prostitution and child pornography) * Using them for work that is illegal (for example, as beggars, or drug dealers) * Adoption * Forced marriage It is difficult to get exact numbers, but the International Labour Organization estimated that about 1.2 million children are trafficked per year. Like human trafficking, trafficking of children is a crime. == References == Category:Child abuse Category:Modern-day slavery
